title: Wanted: One Groom
description: If Hanna Rockwell isn't married by the time she reaches her 30th birthday, she will lose her entire inheritance, which not only effects her, but effects her mother and brother, who live at Rockwell Place with her. Tired of the pressure her mother, Mary, and brother, Will are putting on her to get married to save their home, she challenges them. "Mother, you plan the wedding. Will, you find the groom. And I'll get married on my 30th birthday!"
author: Pat Ballard
